comments.comment: The part about being far away and alone is so accurate 1:58:19 . I worked on a crew in Alaska and ended up being at camp alone because weather stopped a crew swap. What if something happens world wide and I‚Äôm stuck here alone‚Ä¶

The Book of Job tells us that humans must live in harmony with nature and seek to learn from its wise and mysterious ways: ‚ÄúBut ask the beasts, and they will teach you; the birds of the air, and they will tell you; or the plants of the earth, and they will teach you; and the fish of the sea will declare to you.
